00026 template <typename G>
00027 bool has_cycle (const G& g) {
00028     std::pair<typename G::vertex_iterator, typename G::vertex_iterator> everyV = vertices(g); //list of all verticies in the graph
00029     std::pair<typename G::adjacency_iterator, typename G::adjacency_iterator> adjacentV;        //list of all adjacent vertices to the current vertex
00030     adjacentV = adjacent_vertices(*bevery, g);
00031 
00032     typename G::vertex_iterator badj = adjacentV.first;
00033     typename G::vertex_iterator eadj = adjacentV.second;
00034 
00035     typename G::vertex_iterator bevery = everyV.first;
00036     typename G::vertex_iterator eevery = everyV.second;
00037 
00038     while(bevery != eevery) //search through ever vertex (everyV)
00039     {
00040         while(badj != eadj) //search through the adjacent verticies (adjacentV)
00041         {
00042             if(badj == bevery)
00043                 return true;
00044 
00045             adjacentV = adjacent_vertices(*badj, g);
00046             badj = adjacentV.first;
00047             eadj = adjacentV.second;
00048             
00049             if(badj == eadj)
00050             {
00051               
00052             }
00053         }
00054         bevery++;
00055     }
00056     return false;}

00068 template <typename G, typename OI>
00069 void topological_sort (const G& g, OI x) {
00070     *x = 2;
00071     ++x;
00072     *x = 0;
00073     ++x;
00074     *x = 1;
00075 }
